title: Grafana’s Radical App Platform: WebAssembly, Kubernetes and APIs
author: B Cameron Gain
description: Grafana capabilities will be extended to accommodate applications such as storage, multiple API management and extending its observability capabilities to offer event-driven functionalities, Kubernetes management and other capabilities.
cntitle: Grafana 的激进应用程序平台：WebAssembly、Kubernetes 和 API
cndescription: Grafana 的功能将得到扩展，以适应存储、多 API 管理等应用程序，并扩展其可观察性功能，以提供事件驱动的功能、Kubernetes 管理和其他功能。
